nodes.text: A clone trooper pilot served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. He participated in the Second Battle of Geonosis in which he piloted one of the gunships participating in the assault. The gunship, which was carrying clone marshal commander CC-2224 nicknamed "Cody". This pilot was able to land one of a handful of gunships at the Site under heavy fire.

This clone pilot was Cloned from the Mandalorian bounty hunter Jango Fett. Serving under CC-2224 during his time on Geonosis, he was assigned to bring a gunship carrying Cody and clones to a land site where they would later capture a droid base.
Like all his fellow clones, he stood at 1.83 like his genetic template.
